page.title: 05Poolfield Court
page.content: Mr and Mrs Breese are the owners of Poolfield Court{Caravan Site.}The land has two acres and there is a lovely view of the countryside. Five is the limit on the Caravan Site.People can bring cats,dogs, or any pet animals. In{Easter to September}there are not very many customers.Mrs Breese has been looking after the land for{ten {years.}There are not very many regular customers.This year it is a very wet season so numbers are very few around the Caravan Site.There are{village} {shops}around the countryside so visitors can buy their daily paper and food.They provide their own toilet in the caravan,or use a nearby public toilet.They have no Caravans to hire for people.The land was{rough} {grazing}with some coniferous trees. The whole Countryside was green with lovely pasture.
